pullrequest.title: Add workaround for limiting instance by hardware type

content.raw:
This is a good start for a possible feature that could  add:

* Also compare the database information (rather than simply the aws instance info), so we could distinguish between a PRIUS instance and a SRC instance (that might use the same type).
* A middleware to decrease the count when a machine is terminated.

A test with the UI would be nice to see how the error is presented to the user (Jason's app we are integrating with, and in Cloudsim).
